alert.note: Alert for Rawlins (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 11 at 1:59PM CDT until May 11 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Rawlins County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Ludell, or 4 miles east of Atwood, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Rawlins County. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
